name: valet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone in a hotel who cleans clothes
US someone at a hotel or restaurant who puts your car in a parking space for you
the personal male servant of a rich man, especially in the past

(esp. in the past) the personal male servant of a wealthy man, or (in the present) an employee of a restaurant or hotel, who puts your car in a parking space for you: Valet parking is available for our customers.
